text: wbyn 'ashab aljanat wa'ashab alnaar hajiz eazim yuqal lah alaeraf, waealaa hdha alhajiz rijal yaerifun 'ahl aljanat wa'ahl alnaar belamathm, kbyad wujuh 'ahl aljnt, wswad wujuh 'ahl alnar, whwla' alrijal qawm astwt hsnathm wsyyathm yarjun rahmat allah teala. wanadaa rijal al'aeraf 'ahl aljanat balthyt qaylyn lhm: salam elykm, wa'ahl al'aeraf lm ydkhlu aljanat bed, wahum yarjun dkhwlha
